projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: Solves a sudoku puzzle of any size and difficulty in parallel connecting to a Java app hosted on AWS Lambda.

projects.title: Financial Planner
projects.description: Projects your future finances graphically based on recurring income and expenses. Capable of uploading exported transactions from Mint.com.

projects.title: Course Analysis
projects.description: Analyze and customize your course by simply moving your tee markers. Distance, slope, multiple teeboxes, and pin locations automatically calculated for you.

projects.title: Fast Feed
projects.description: (Retired) Iphone / Android app that combines multiple social media feeds into one keyword searchable feed.

projects.title: Up And Down The River
projects.description: Streamlines the card game's score keeping process with the Jeopardy mode feature.
